problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △AOB, ∠AOB = N_0, BD, AC are two heights. Connect CD, if AB = N_1, then the length of DC is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图延长AD、BC交于点M．∵∠AOB=120°,∴∠DOA=∠COB=60°,∵AD⊥BD,AC⊥BC,∴∠ADM=∠MDB=∠ACB=∠ACM=90°,∴∠MAC=∠MBD=30°,∴△MAC∽△MBD,∴\frac{MA}{MB}=\frac{MC}{MD},∴\frac{MA}{MC}=\frac{MB}{MD},∠M=∠M,∴△MDC∽△MBA,∴\frac{DC}{AB}=\frac{MD}{MB},在RT△MBD中,∵∠MBD=30°,∴MB=2MD,∵AB=4,∴\frac{DC}{4}=\frac{1}{2},∴DC=2．故选:B．
